main event: A couple observed a cylindrical, cigar-shaped object that started stationary and then accelerated swiftly upwards until no longer visible.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 5-6 minutes., The object was first noticed while the witness was rowing a boat., The wife had seen the object for 2 to 3 minutes before her husband noticed it., Conditions were clear with good visibility at dusk., Local newspaper reported several sightings from residents in the area.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Ruxton, approximately 52 years old, employed by Traverse City newspaper
